subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A. did not grab control of Thursday’s game against Weber State until the end of the first half, but the Bruins led by 20 early in the second half and went on to an easy victory.
snippet: U.C.L.A. did not grab control of Thursday’s game against Weber State until the end of the first half, but the Bruins led by 20 early in the second half and went on to an easy victory.
